plural: canon of laws; laws
depict; symbolise

Bào Jiāo 鮑焦 (5th century) is celebrated in Warring States literature as a moralist recluse who committed suicide in disgust over the sordid state of the world as he saw it. [XINXU 3.74] [ZHUANG 29; ZGC Yan 1; HSWZ 1.25, 1.27, 7.6; SY17.17; XINXU 7.26; QIANFULUN 5.9; FSTY 2] Unger, Prosopography no. 546
be well-disposed towards support emotionally; have loving feelings towards and take loving care of (superiors)
show intimate loving concern for, feel close to
be unrealistic
be absurd; be absurd and unrealistic

personally; face-to-face

personally; face-to-face
in person; personally; face-to-face

tls:text.tls:line: "The river is the evil influence."

sense.def: in divination: bode ill; mean disaster; bring bad fortune; have a supernaturally disastrous influence

sense.def: the N2 of ancient times

sense.def: the N2 of ancient times

tls:text.tls:line: wasteful extravagance is not because they despised sex or were miserly with their property.

sense.def: be chary with; begrudge, be stingy with; be possessive about; be loath to lose

sense.def: fraternal-love-style affectionate care for others

sense.def: marking the identification of the subject

tls:text.tls:line: who lost a brother.

seg.line: 然而求卿相輔佐獨不如是之公，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 然而求卿相輔佐獨不如是之公，
tls:text.tls:line: However, in seeking ministers and assistants [actually] there is none of this impartiality,

sense.def: 如是之甚 "as intensely as that" modifying an adverb or adjective

tls:text.tls:line: In this it resembles the wise man.

sense.def: resemble (in essence), be alike

sense.def: resemble (in essence), be alike

sense.def: resemble (in essence), be alike

sense.def: resemble (in essence), be alike

sense.def: resemble (in essence), be alike

tls:text.tls:line: he is complete as though he possessed territory.

sense.def: resemble (in essence), be alike

tls:text.tls:line: I saw that you seemed to be a superior man,

sense.def: resemble

tls:text.tls:line: It is comparable to eating to repletion and then vomiting.

sense.def: 譬如為山"It is like building up a mound": It is like V-ing

sense.def: 譬如為山"It is like building up a mound": It is like V-ing

seg.line: 其身體四肢欲安而不作，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 其身體四肢欲安而不作，
tls:text.tls:line: his four limbs desire repose and inactivity;

sense.def: the body of the N

tls:text.tls:line: "Alas,

sense.def: (this) is tragic! (this) is a pity! [Note that it appears that the omission of the subject is idiomatic, if not obligatory. Hence vi(0).]

tls:text.tls:line: How can the person who does not know how to pattern himself after Heaven

sense.def: how to, using what (the subject) V-s

tls:text.tls:line: if you would hold to the way of fullness,

sense.def: 持盈守成"safeguard the plenitude of what one has and safeguard what one has achieved": maintain and safeguard the plenitude of one's achievements without aiming for more than can be safely maintained.

tls:text.tls:line: there was no way they could make use [of these things].

sense.def: be not of use for anything, be of no use; be useless

tls:text.tls:line: but cutting his throat, died in the court.

sense.def: cut one's throat

tls:text.tls:line: The dust will only blind you.

sense.def: dust; sand; (also abstractly in a transferred sense: defilement)

tls:text.tls:line: and the dust [of battle] rises to heaven.

sense.def: dust and dirt (of all kinds)

tls:text.tls:line: Being sincere in his love, he does not rob;

sense.def: fervently

tls:text.tls:line: he reduces things to rule

sense.def: 先王之法"norms and procedures of the first kings":(non-penal) norms and procedures; laws and administrative rules; set of explicit rules governing a social group; norms

tls:text.tls:line: Thus in driving horses there is method,

sense.def: standard preferred method, standard technique

tls:text.tls:line: not to put in operation the laws of one's prince

sense.def: 先王之法"norms and procedures of the first kings":(non-penal) norms and procedures; laws and administrative rules; set of explicit rules governing a social group; norms

tls:text.tls:line: but I cannot neglect the laws:

sense.def: 先王之法"norms and procedures of the first kings":(non-penal) norms and procedures; laws and administrative rules; set of explicit rules governing a social group; norms

tls:text.tls:line: but I cannot neglect the laws:

sense.def: fail to act in accordance with; fail to live up to

tls:text.tls:line: Since his regulations for [the masses] below were easy to follow,

sense.def: 先王之法"norms and procedures of the first kings":(non-penal) norms and procedures; laws and administrative rules; set of explicit rules governing a social group; norms

tls:text.tls:line: Since his regulations for [the masses] below were easy to follow,

sense.def: among the humble people; at the more inferior level, addressing those below one's own status

tls:text.tls:line: still the right way of acting lies therein.

sense.def: 先王之法"norms and procedures of the first kings":(non-penal) norms and procedures; laws and administrative rules; set of explicit rules governing a social group; norms

tls:text.tls:line: and whose mind is incapable of knowing the methods of the Former Kings.

sense.def: 先王之法"norms and procedures of the first kings":(non-penal) norms and procedures; laws and administrative rules; set of explicit rules governing a social group; norms

seg.line: 故唐虞之法可得而攷也

tls:text.tls:srcline: 故唐虞之法可得而攷也
tls:text.tls:line: Thus it is possible to examine the methods of T'ang and Yyu,

sense.def: 先王之法"norms and procedures of the first kings":(non-penal) norms and procedures; laws and administrative rules; set of explicit rules governing a social group; norms

tls:text.tls:line: it would be possible to see [again] the methods of T'ang and Yu,

sense.def: 先王之法"norms and procedures of the first kings":(non-penal) norms and procedures; laws and administrative rules; set of explicit rules governing a social group; norms

tls:text.tls:line: When he goes to [rectify] the methods of the Hundred Kings,

sense.def: the hundred kings, all the kings that were and are

tls:text.tls:line: When he goes to [rectify] the methods of the Hundred Kings,

sense.def: legal arrangements; prescribed bureaucratic practice; particularly: impartial implementation of the law of the land

tls:text.tls:line: When he goes to [rectify] the methods of the Hundred Kings,

sense.def: legal arrangements of the various kings

seg.line: 而制度可以為天下法矣

tls:text.tls:srcline: 而制度可以為天下法矣
tls:text.tls:line: their practice was worth taking as a model for the empire.

sense.def: universal model

tls:text.tls:line: When his sexual vitality is overflowing he thinks of getting posterity.

sense.def: subtle sexual urges

tls:text.tls:line: kept his mind and spirit quiet,

sense.def: state of mind; mental and physical state of mind

tls:text.tls:line: investigating his motives,

sense.def: energetic aspirations

tls:text.tls:line: Do not enter into discussion with one of argumentative disposition.

sense.def: dynamic mood, active mood

tls:text.tls:line: When he got up, his vitality became propressively weaker.

sense.def: vital energies; aspiring energies

seg.line: 如是則天氣奉養而生物豐美矣

tls:text.tls:srcline: 如是則天氣奉養而生物豐美矣
tls:text.tls:line: Under such conditions the Heavenly breath is nourished, and living things are abundant.

sense.def: vital energies from Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: and his appetite and ch'i increasingly decline.

sense.def: vital energies; aspiring energies

tls:text.tls:line: Tzu-hsia's speech and expression (ch'i) were choked to a degree

sense.def: dynamics of speach, way of talking; personal style in talking

tls:text.tls:line: his speech and expression are low.

sense.def: dynamics of speach, way of talking; personal style in talking

tls:text.tls:line: clarify the spirit and intention [of his master],

sense.def: energetic aspirations

tls:text.tls:line: Meng, Prince of Ch'ang, wishing to study under Min-tzu,

sense.def: be a student of; study under; aspire to live up to; aspire to become like 學於孔子

seg.line: 使吾君好學士而不惡問

tls:text.tls:srcline: 使吾君好學士而不惡問
tls:text.tls:line: "May my Prince love learning and not dislike to ask questions.

sense.def: scholar, intellectual; learned gentlemen

tls:text.tls:line: "Is it not indeed a difficult thing?"

sense.def: be absurd; be absurd and unrealistic

tls:text.tls:line: Master, to die for him?"

sense.def: be absurd; be absurd and unrealistic

tls:text.tls:line: In regard to the living creatures of Heaven and Earth,

sense.def: the myriad kinds of living creatures and/or things

tls:text.tls:line: In regard to the living creatures of Heaven and Earth,

sense.def: (the N)of/in the universe (construed as a container)

tls:text.tls:line: In regard to the living creatures of Heaven and Earth,

sense.def: all manner of things between heaven and earth, including all kinds of animals, plants and things

seg.line: 聖人仁士之於天地之間也

tls:text.tls:srcline: 聖人仁士之於天地之間也
tls:text.tls:line: the function of the saintly man and the humane gentleman between Heaven and Earth

sense.def: everyone between heaven and earth> everbody

seg.line: 至精而妙乎天地之間者

tls:text.tls:srcline: 至精而妙乎天地之間者
tls:text.tls:line: most refined and subtle essence between Heaven and Earth

sense.def: 居天下之間“live in the world" the world as a space (for all things including humans); by implication: everyone in this space

tls:text.tls:line: though he may not be able to perfect himself in the methods of right conduct,

sense.def: philosophy; philosophies

tls:text.tls:line: though he may not be able to perfect himself in the methods of right conduct,

sense.def: true philosophy

tls:text.tls:line: aid him with methods of instruction.

sense.def: true philosophy

tls:text.tls:line: A man who has not heard of the methods of the True Way

sense.def: true philosophy

tls:text.tls:line: Alas! Oh Heaven,

sense.def: High Heaven, 老天: =昊天
cause distress to (oneself)

tls:text.tls:line: "August Heaven sends down its blessing,

sense.def: Sovereign Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: Now that August Heaven has sent down disaster on your treasure tower

sense.def: Sovereign Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: are the same."

sense.def: be one and the same

tls:text.tls:line: not because there was no good government;

sense.def: good governance; effective administration (as opposed to a good government)

tls:text.tls:line: not because there was no good government;

sense.def: good governance; effective administration (as opposed to a good government)

tls:text.tls:line: he wished to make him a san-kung.

sense.def: Threefold Lord; a senior Lord, an honorary official with moral duties. ranking above the feudal lords and right next to the Emperor

tls:text.tls:line: What are the san-kung?

sense.def: the senior Three Lords (differently defined for Zhou court （太師、太傅、太保） and Han bureaucracy)

tls:text.tls:line: What are the san-kung?

sense.def: the senior Three Lords (differently defined for Zhou court （太師、太傅、太保） and Han bureaucracy （司空，司徒)

tls:text.tls:line: such are the duties of the san-kung.

sense.def: the senior Three Lords (differently defined for Zhou court （太師、太傅、太保） and Han bureaucracy)

tls:text.tls:line: who was characterized

sense.def: by nature he; as a person; being the person he is

tls:text.tls:line: reflecting within himself and acting consistently.

sense.def: reflect upon one's own person; try to assess one's own person; German: in sich gehen

tls:text.tls:line: If the horse could speak

sense.def: If, counter to fact

tls:text.tls:line: If the horse could speak,

sense.def: If, counter to fact

tls:text.tls:line: If the horse could speak,

sense.def: If, counter to fact

tls:text.tls:line: Thus, even if people had excess property and luxury goods,

sense.def: even if, contrary to conceivable fact

tls:text.tls:line: and even if I did know,

sense.def: even if, contrary to conceivable fact

tls:text.tls:line: and not only did he succeed in following his prince,

sense.def: not only

tls:text.tls:line: Is it not that he had no eye to personal advantage,

sense.def: this is not because

tls:text.tls:line: not because I thought it much,

sense.def: this is not because

tls:text.tls:line: is not because milliet wasps and altar rats are holy,

sense.def: this is not because

tls:text.tls:line: 'It is to be either Ch'eng or Huang, [one of] the two,

sense.def: if not V1 then V2> either V1 or V2

tls:text.tls:line: is the sage of the empire.

sense.def: the most Vs of the Ns in the world

tls:text.tls:line: while none of them had any hope for his own life.

sense.def: hope (often unrealistically) for; have any realistic hope for

tls:text.tls:line: For this reason the superior man expels false hopes of good luck,

sense.def: 徼幸 "have false/unrealistic hopes for good luck"

tls:text.tls:line: Hoping for good luck

sense.def: indulge in false hopes for good luck

seg.line: 鄉使宋人不聞孔子之言

tls:text.tls:srcline: 鄉使宋人不聞孔子之言
tls:text.tls:line: If previously the Prince of Sung had not heard of Confucius' words,

sense.def: N has its origin in Npr

tls:text.tls:line: T'ang I-jo [once] knocked at Confucius' gate and said,

sense.def: Npr owner of N

tls:text.tls:line: he hopes to avoid danger and destruction,

sense.def: fervently hope to; would dearly like to (what you are not sure to be able to achieve)
